description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中华人民共和国政治人物。因在脱贫攻坚战中作出突出贡献，被授予“全国脱贫攻坚先进个人”荣誉称号。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China and a political figure in the People's Republic of China. He was awarded the honorary title of 'National Advanced Individual in Poverty Alleviation' for his outstanding contributions to the poverty alleviation campaign.

description.zh-cn: 江西省赣州市赣县区下辖的乡镇级行政单位。
description.en: A township-level administrative unit under Ganxian District, Ganzhou, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 江西省赣州市赣县区下辖的乡镇级行政单位。
description.en: A township-level administrative unit under Ganxian District, Ganzhou, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 江西省赣州市赣县区下辖的乡镇级行政单位。
description.en: A township-level administrative unit under Ganxian District, Ganzhou, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府于21世纪开展的一项旨在消除绝对贫困的全国性运动。
description.en: A nationwide campaign launched by the government of the People's Republic of China in the 21st century to eradicate absolute poverty.

nodes.id: 全国脱贫攻坚总结表彰大会

zh-cn: 全国脱贫攻坚总结表彰大会
en: National Poverty Alleviation Summary and Commendation Conference

nodes.id: 全国脱贫攻坚先进个人

zh-cn: 全国脱贫攻坚先进个人
en: National Advanced Individual in Poverty Alleviation

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央、国务院在全国脱贫攻坚总结表彰大会上授予的荣誉称号。
description.en: An honorary title awarded by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Council at the National Poverty Alleviation Summary and Commendation Conference.

description.zh-cn: 陈峰云是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Chen Fengyun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

position.en: Director of Baishi Office, Town Mayor

description.zh-cn: 陈峰云历任田村镇白石办事处主任、田村镇镇长。
description.en: Chen Fengyun successively served as the Director of Baishi Office and the Mayor of Tiancun Town.

description.zh-cn: 陈峰云曾任长洛乡党委书记。
description.en: Chen Fengyun served as the Party Secretary of Changluo Township.

description.zh-cn: 陈峰云曾任茅店镇党委书记。
description.en: Chen Fengyun served as the Party Secretary of Maodian Town.

description.zh-cn: 陈峰云在长洛乡任期内在脱贫攻坚战中作出突出贡献。
description.en: During his tenure in Changluo Township, Chen Fengyun made outstanding contributions to the poverty alleviation campaign.

relationships.source: 全国脱贫攻坚总结表彰大会

description.zh-cn: 在2021年2月25日举行的全国脱贫攻坚总结表彰大会上，陈峰云被授予“全国脱贫攻坚先进个人”荣誉称号。
description.en: At the National Poverty Alleviation Summary and Commendation Conference held on February 25, 2021, Chen Fengyun was awarded the honorary title of 'National Advanced Individual in Poverty Alleviation'.

relationships.target: 全国脱贫攻坚先进个人

description.zh-cn: 于2021年2月25日获得“全国脱贫攻坚先进个人”荣誉称号。
description.en: Was awarded the honorary title 'National Advanced Individual in Poverty Alleviation' on February 25, 2021.
